entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is trying to catch up with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A Death Eater and a teacher at Hogwarts, being chased by Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper of Hogwarts, who is fighting off the blond Death Eater.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts and a member of the Malfoy family, running away with Snape.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Malfoy's son, who is being told to run by Snape.

entities.name: giantess mother
entities.description: Hagrid's mother, who was a giantess and gave him his strength and toughened skin.

relationships.description: Snape is ordering Draco to run.
Hagrid is fighting the blond Death Eater.
Snape and Malfoy are running together.
